item.title: Trump dismisses question about alert systems after touring Texas flood devastation
item.description: President Donald Trump is in Texas on Friday in the wake of devastating floods that killed at least 121 people, including dozens of children.

item.title: WATCH: Trump threatens 35% tariff on Canadian goods
item.description: President Donald Trump threatened a 35% tariff on Canadian goods but said the U.S. would consider adjusting its stance if Canada helps stop the flow o...

item.title: Pennsylvania experiencing 'intermittent' 911 outages: Police
item.description: A statewide 911 outage has been reported in Pennsylvania, police confirmed on Friday.

item.title: WATCH: Shelter animals relocated after Texas floods
item.description: Shelter animals in Texas have been moved to make space for the many pets lost in the recent floods.

item.title: WATCH: Labubu or Lafufu?: How to tell the real thing from a fake
item.description: From facial characteristics to QR codes and tags, “GMA” breaks down how to spot the real toy.
